bibl.title: Report on the 35th Season of Excavation and Restoration on the Island of Elephantine. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: 35th season of the German Institute of Archaeology and the Swiss Institute for Architectural and Archaeological Research on Ancient Egypt at Elephantine, October 31st 2005 - April 20th 2006. - See in part. pp. 209-210: 5. Temple of Khnum: Houses of the Late Antique Period (Felix Arnold); - 220: 11. Textiles of the First Millennium AD (Roberta Cortopassi).
bibl.seg: Raue Dietrich et alii, Report on the 35th Season of Excavation and Restoration on the Island of Elephantine. Avec résumé en anglais.
